seniority_level.evidence: 6-7 years total experience with 4-5 relevant years, responsibilities include implementing predictive models and designing enterprise applications, though title doesn't include 'Senior'

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' with core responsibilities focused on data gathering, storage, processing, and ETL pipelines

sub_specialty.evidence: Emphasis on ETL tools, data integration, and batch processing with Azure Databricks and PySpark, though real-time processing also mentioned

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role focuses on technical implementation and collaboration without mention of team leadership, mentoring, or direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, and Azure Blob Storage explicitly mentioned throughout the job description

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only Azure cloud services mentioned, no other cloud providers referenced

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job description explicitly mentions both 'batch and real-time processing' capabilities

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific data orchestration tools mentioned, only Azure DevOps for CI/CD purposes

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Blob Storage mentioned with Databricks, suggesting modern lakehouse architecture patterns

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Kochi, Kerala, India with onsite work model requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: India-based role with specific location requirement in Kochi, Kerala

relocation_required.evidence: Role requires being already based in Kochi, Kerala, India - no relocation package mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: India-based role makes H1B visa sponsorship not applicable, no sponsorship mentioned

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: India-based role makes OPT/CPT programs not applicable, work authorization requirements not specified

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, implying work authorization in India is required

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment type with no contract mentions, typical for W2 employee positions

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression paths, promotion ladders, or growth opportunities mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaborative environment working with diverse teams of scientists, engineers, and consultants

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career growth paths mentioned in the description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, IC paths, or management paths mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Mandatory Skills' and 'Preferred Technical And Professional Experience', balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused data engineering role with well-defined responsibilities and specific technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills and experience requirements (6-7 years) are appropriate for senior data engineer level without obvious inflation
